title: tukkArAm rAmadAs
sahitya:
tukkArAm rAmdAs manap-pakkuvamikkavan bhAgatOttaman


anupallavi

  ekkAlamum divyanAma bhajanaiyilE ekkaLitt-inburum bhaktan jIvanmuktan


caraNam    pATTUm kathaiyum kalai UTTum pulavargaLin kUTTam enadu paLLikkUDam Aghi 
vazhikATTum isai arivai nATTum manaviruLai OTTum vairAgyattait-tITTum tiramai koNDa
